node.doctext:
A thin layer of dust coats the workshop, though some disturbance makes you think someone cleaned up a few things around March 21st...

[sleeping wolf|My] [edev] Motto: Before suggesting something, code it. It's a lot harder to argue with that way.

My [edev] Notes and Reminders
(Just because something is here doesn't mean I'm going to do it.) Suggestions for level powers and such:

  • "[Page of Cool]" powers after a certain level.
  • distribution list
  • /warmfuzzy
  • Spoilers?
  • Email link on userpage? Homepage link on userpage? Higher-level users getting more links?
  • Outside links from userpages? High-level users have binary posting ability?

My proposal

  • [Level 7]-- 1 external link from homenode
  • [Level 8]-- distribution list
  • [Level 9]-- 2 external links, the evil of /warmfuzzy
  • [Level 10]-- [cloaking] oneself in the [Other Users] nodelet.
  • [Level 11]-- 4 external links, [Page of Cool] powers
  • [Level 12]-- "[Alchemy]": transform XP into more votes or C!s (at a losing ratio relative to the voting XP bonus, of course)
  • [Level 13]-- "[Goetia]": using XP for the following: reduce one's [EDB] counter; being able to dodge the EDB (at high XP cost); (for free) control over the EDB in a room one creates, if that doesn't already exist; bribing the EDB to eat someone (at utterly ludicrous XP cost); perhaps even putting words in [Cool Man Eddie]'s mouth in the chatterbox
    Not necc. level-related:
    • Alternating color lines in random nodes to make it easier to distinguish between them.
    • Remove links in printable mode
    • Scratch pad submit button to submit to a node?
node.title: sleeping wolf's workshop
